amendment.description: To provide for improvements in access to services in rural hospitals and critical access hospitals.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1122 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1122 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Brownback. (consideration: CR S8681) To provide for improvements in access to services in rural hospitals and critical access hospitals.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1122 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1122 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Brownback.
